name: Heavy Slam
effect: Add 1 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool for every 25 kgs. of weight the User has above the target's weight. Up to +4 Extra Dice may be added this way. If the target has used the move Minimize during the scene gain an additional +2 Damage Dice and Never Fail.
description: The user slams the foe using its whole body weight. Smaller foes will be deeply affected.
